creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Nude man covered from the waist down in a towel; he faces forward in the direction of the viewer; the words "I'm Cold Billy/Can't Stop Shaking" inscribed, UC; predominant colors: blue, grey and yellow
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "I'm Cold Billy, Can't Stop Shaking", from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
